user.title: Set up Energy Tracker
user.description: Enter your personal access token to connect to your Energy Tracker account.

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure Energy Tracker
reconfigure.description: Update your Energy Tracker account token. Leave the token field empty to keep the existing token.

data.api_token: Personal access token (leave empty to keep existing)

error.empty_token: Personal access token cannot be empty.

abort.already_configured: This personal access token is already configured. Each token can only be used once.

auth_error_invalid_token.title: Authentication with Energy Tracker failed
auth_error_invalid_token.description: The configured personal access token is invalid or expired. Please create a new token in your Energy Tracker account and update the token in the integration settings.

auth_error_insufficient_permissions.title: Insufficient permissions for Energy Tracker
auth_error_insufficient_permissions.description: The configured personal access token does not have the required permissions. Please create a new token with the necessary permissions in your Energy Tracker account and update the token in the settings of this integration.

timeout.message: Request timed out. Please check network connection and try again.

network_error.message: Network error during request. Please check internet connection and try again.

bad_request.message: Invalid input. Please check input data. ({error})

auth_failed.message: Authentication failed. Please check your Personal access token in integration settings.

device_not_found.message: Standard measuring device not found. Please check device ID.

rate_limit.message: Too many requests. Please try again in {retry_after} seconds.

rate_limit_no_time.message: Too many requests. Please try again later.

server_error.message: A server error has occurred. Please try again later. ({error})

unknown_error.message: An unexpected error has occurred. Please try again later. ({error})

device_id_empty.message: Standard measuring device ID is required.

invalid_number.message: Entity {entity_id} value '{state}' is not a number.

no_api_token.message: No personal access token configured. Check account settings.

send_meter_reading.name: Send meter reading
send_meter_reading.description: Sends the current value of a sensor to Energy Tracker.

device_id.name: Standard measuring device ID
device_id.description: ID of the standard measuring device in your Energy Tracker account

source_entity_id.name: Sensor
source_entity_id.description: Sensor that provides the meter reading

allow_rounding.name: Allow rounding
allow_rounding.description: Round value to match meter precision
